scripts.build: cd packages/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "lerna run start --scope frontend" "lerna run start --scope backend"
scripts.build-start: concurrently "lerna run build-start --scope frontend" "lerna run build-start --scope backend"
scripts.delete: rm -rf node_modules && cd packages/backend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules build
